attributes.action: Repeal the online safety act and revoke keir starmers power as PM
attributes.background: Immediately revoke keir starmer as PM by either removing him from labour and/or call for a mandatory reelection. Repeal the online safety act which dangerously consumes users private information by having to "verify" their age for the "safety of our children". Now just imagine there is a data leak.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the Online Safety Act to be repealed: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/722903

And this petition which calls for a general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
